en: Mummy Pig is watching a keep fit program on television.
zh: 猪妈妈正在看一个健身节目。
现在一起来吧，这就对了。

en: It's a program about doing exercises to keep fit.
zh: 这个是减肥的健身节目。

en: You don't look very fit, Daddy.
zh: 可你看上去一点也不匀称，爸爸。

en: Your tummy is a bit big!
I'm very fit! I'll show you!
zh: 我很匀称的！我可以给你看看！
碰一下你的脚趾。像这样！

en: Daddy! Stop pretending that you can't touch your toes.
zh: 爸爸！不要假装碰不到你的脚趾哦。

en: Daddy Pig really cannot touch his toes.
zh: 猪爸爸真的不能碰到他的脚趾。

en: Hmmm... Maybe I should do a bit of exercise.
zh: 嗯。。。也许我应该做点锻炼了。

en: Daddy Pig! You have to start exercising now!
zh: 猪爸爸！你现在就应该开始锻炼了！

en: Don't worry, Daddy, I will help you.
zh: 不用担心，爸爸，我会帮你的，

en: Oh, alright! Peppa, you're in charge of getting me fit.
zh: 哦，好吧！佩奇，你负责监督我减肥。

en: First, you must do some press-ups!
zh: 首先，你必须做些俯卧撑！

en: Now, I want you to do...one hundred!
Come on, children, help me make lunch.
zh: 来吧，孩子们，来帮我做午餐。

en: No, Daddy! You've got one hundred press-ups to do.
zh: 不行，爸爸！你还有一百个俯卧撑要做啊。

en: Mummy Pig, Peppa and George are in the kitchen making lunch.
zh: 猪妈妈，佩奇和乔治在厨房做午餐。

en: Daddy Pig is still doing his press-ups.
zh: 猪爸爸仍然在做他的俯卧撑。

en: I do hope he's not overdoing it.
zh: 我真的希望他不要做得过火了。

en: There was something interesting on the TV.
Maybe Daddy will have more success with my old exercise bike.
zh: 也许爸爸用我的的旧健身单车效果会更好。

en: I'll be able to cycle and watch TV at the same time.
zh: 我可以一边骑一边看电视。
我听不到电视里的声音！

en: You've got to get fit somehow.
zh: 但是你一定得瘦下来才行。

en: I know! You can use my bicycle.
zh: 我知道了！你可以骑我的自行车。

en: Yes, and then you'll get some fresh air as well.
zh: 是的，而且你还可以呼吸新鲜空气。

en: Daddy Pig is going to ride on Peppa's little bicycle.
zh: 猪爸爸要骑佩奇的小自行车。

en: Yes! Yes! Thank you, Peppa, I know. Bye bye.
zh: 好的！好的！谢谢你，佩奇，我知道了。再见。

en: Getting fit is quite hard work.
Aha! Now I can get fit without having to pedal!
zh: 啊哈！现在我不用踩踏板就能瘦身了！

en: Daddy Pig is going very fast.
Oh! Maybe I'd better slow down.
Arrgh! The brakes aren't strong enough!
Daddy Pig has been gone for a long time.
zh: 猪爸爸已经出去很长时间了。

en: Daddy must be really enjoying himself to be away for so long.
zh: 猪爸爸一定骑得很开心所以才去了那么久。

en: I whizzed all the way down the hill,
zh: 我一直飞速骑到山底下，

en: and then I had to push the bike all the way back up again.
zh: 然后又把自行车推了上来。

en: Well, at least I've done my exercise.
zh: 好吧，至少我已经做了锻炼了。

en: You'll have to do some more exercise tomorrow.
Daddy, to get fit, you have to exercise every day.
zh: 爸爸，要减肥，你得每天都锻炼。

en: But don't worry, Daddy,I'll make sure you do it.
zh: 但是不用担心，爸爸，我会监督你的。
